ItemTooltips.blink:
v6.79 Changes

- Damage disable no longer ignores self damage
ItemTooltips.ghost: Good stats gain and survivability against Ursa, SA, Huskar, etc.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots:
v6.79 Changes

- Now prioritizes nearby structures first within 325 AoE from targeting position (when ground targeted)

Best boots for Invoker now
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: 16% MS boost is synergizes well with Wex
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Get this item if you can do so around the 6th minute. Otherwise, forget it. Invoker is more concerned about levels than gold, so transmute level six creeps for 2.5x the experience! Note: an entire set of beginning creep wave gives 227 XP. Transmuting with Midas on a level 6 creep gives 297 XP!
ItemTooltips.sheepstick:
Hex, refresh, Hex again!
Best item for ganking. Very costly, but it is worth the price. Get this item before Aghanim Scepter if you are desperate to end the game.

AbilityTooltips.invoker_cold_snap: Cold Snap has 1000 range, but Invokers attack range is 600. If Quas is low level, cast Cold Snap with a distance around 300 or your next attack will not trigger Cold Snap because it will be on cooldown. Most of the time, it is a good idea to use animation canceling during Cold Snap's duration.
AbilityTooltips.invoker_ghost_walk: Ghost walk can dodge certain projectiles. Invoke interrupts TP scroll, but Ghost Walk does not. Ghost Walk's slow aura is not blocked by magic immunity! AbilityTooltips.invoker_chaos_meteor: Meteor provides a small vision; Cold Snap quickly! Double Meteor does not stack anymore; however, if you keep the distance between two Meteors more than 300, Meteor will deal 90% or more of it's damage. AbilityTooltips.invoker_deafening_blast:
This spell can push opponents on/off cliffs.
Deaf Blast can counter BKB.  Disarm is not removed after BKB activation.  Blast is a great spell to combo with Sun Strike. Blast can also be used to "PULL" targets! Use Tornado or Eul first, then time blast so that target gets hit by back end of blast.
